title: Emergency changes
content:
An emergency change is an expedited process to implement emergency changes to the production environment. A user with the appropriate permissions can open an emergency change. (By default, Incident and Change Coordinators and Managers have these permissions.) An emergency change uses a dedicated, shortened approval plan.

Service Management notifies you when there is an update to an emergency change. For example, there is a notification when Service Management opens, updates, or closes an emergency change.
